ability.Speedy Recovery: At the end of each turn, if this Pokemon's HP is below 1/3, its Speed is raised by 2 stages and it heals 1/6 of its max HP.

Brave Bird.effect: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target.

Steel Wing.effect: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1 stage.
